A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie wasn't just bad\, it was insulting.  Who goes to a science fiction fantasy film to have left-wing SJW politics rammed down your throat?  It was a huge slap in the face to anyone who grew up with Star Wars.  Leaving aside the heavy-handed politics\, the new characters have no charisma whatsoever.  Couldn't care a less whether any of them lived or died.  Now that the original characters have been either ignominiously killed off or passed away in real life\, and all the plot set-ups from the TFA trashed or ruined\, what's left to see in Episode IX?  Frankly\, I hope they cancel it.  I have no interest in seeing another Social Justice Wars.
